item.description: Aloha! Join us for this special games night. A Hawaiian shirt and/or other appropriate garb is strongly recommended. Prizes will be awarded! For extra credit, bring a Polynesian-themed game. The first person who puns on the word lei will be forced to stand on a chair and dance the hula. We'll meet at the usual place and time: Borders Bookstore on Daniel Webster Highway in Nashua at 7:00 PM.

group.name: The Greater Nashua Gamers Meetup Group

item.name: Games Night / King Kamehameha Day
